alert.note: Alert for Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 21 at 3:45PM CDT until further notice by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of central Arkansas and eastern Arkansas, including the following counties, in central Arkansas, Lonoke and Prairie. In eastern Arkansas, Monroe and Woodruff. * WHEN...From 7 PM CDT this evening through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
